price: Ati nama fakkii keenyaa malee (uumaa biroo) hin taane; nutis sobdoota irraa ta’uu si yaadna.
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā anta illā basharun mith'lunā wa-in naẓunnuka lamina al-kādhibīna
